thread.title: Filip Chytil Honest About Mental Hurdles He's Gone Through Over Recurring Injuries
thread.title_full: Filip Chytil Honest About Mental Hurdles He's Gone Through Over Recurring Injuries

author: Remy Mastey
title: Filip Chytil Honest About Mental Hurdles He's Gone Through Over Recurring Injuries
text:
Filip Chytil Honest About Mental Hurdles He’s Gone Through Over Recurring Injuries
It’s been an up-and-down season for Filip Chytil. He’s played some of the best hockey of his career this season. However, Chytil can’t seem to escape the injury demons. Chytil has missed nine games this season with two separate upper-body injuries. He recently was sidelined for three games before returning on Tuesday night against the Colorado Avalanche. The 25-year-old forward admitted he was not feeling like himself in his return, but was happy just to be back on the ice with his teammates. It’s been hard for Chytil to deal with all of these injuries from a mental standpoint, especially…
Read more at
 thehockeynews.com
